title: 群峦传说1.7.2/1.7.10即将发布
author: 哇咔咔123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 哇咔咔123 于 2014-8-23 21:30 编辑 

原帖地址：http://terrafirmacraft.com/index.html/_/articles/state-of-the-mod-8132014-r52 
作者的一番话[本人英语渣渣]:


So it's been a month since the last state of the mod so I figure its high 
time for another update. I am going to try and do these each month from now on 
if I can remember, wish me luck!

In the past month there has been a 
bit of work done to polish various areas and yet there hasn't been a lot 
accomplished in others. The basics for the new taste stuff that was mentioned in 
the previous SotM has been implemented as well as some more Quality of Life 
stuff for us behind the scenes when it comes to food, but most of the new meal 
type stuff hasn't even been started.

It mostly comes down to me 
knowing what I want to do but not being sure how I want to present it. This 
includes everything from block/item art to gui layouts. As a result, some of the 
new meals may be delayed out of 79 entirely. It depends on what I can come up 
with in the near term.

As for 79 in general, it is in a pretty 
stable state. We've managed to close a lot of 1.7 related bugs that had been 
nagging at us as well as getting SMP working proper. Right now we are still on 
1.7.2 but I expect to move to 1.7.10 before release which should not be a big 
process in all likelihood. 

I know everyone is anxious to get to get their hands on 79, and I'm anxious 
to get it to you guys so I'll keep trying to push myself to knock out some of 
these features. Stay with us. We're getting there. 

翻译:所以它已经一个月以来的MOD的最后状态，所以我估计它的时候再更新。我要尝试，然后每个月从现在开始做这些，如果我还记得，祝我好运！ 

在过去一个月出现了一些工作做抛光各个领域，但没有发生过很多成就他人。提到在以前的SOTM的基础知识，新口味的东西已经实施，以及对生命的东西更多一些品质为我们在幕后，当涉及到食品，但大多数新饼粕类的东西甚至还没有被开始。 

它主要可以归结为我知道我想要做的，但不是知道我要如何呈现它。这包括从块/条艺术GUI布局。其结果是，一些新的餐点可以完全推迟79列。这取决于我能拿出在短期内。 

作为在一般79，它是在一个非常稳定的状态。我们已经成功地关闭了大量的1.7相关的错误已被唠叨着我们，以及获得的SMP工作正常。现在我们还在1.7.2，但我希望这不应该是在所有的可能性很大的过程中释放之前移动到1.7.10。 

我知道大家都很着急去得到他们的手79，我渴望得到它的你们，所以我会继续努力推动自己淘汰某些功能。我们在一起。我们到达那里。




TFC0.79真的好期待，MOD开发团队快点啦，支持的顶起来{:10_492:}

replies.author: 凛
replies.txt_content:
啦啦啦！我爱群峦！
还以为作者弃坑了呢！
真是的

replies.author: 毒蛇
replies.txt_content: 我想说，1.8就快出来，还停留在164的mod是不是直接更新到1.8好了

replies.author: 星夜_涅槃
replies.txt_content: 我家的是渣机，带不懂群峦啊，群峦，多么好的MOD，可惜
